name: crème brûlée cable knit hat (circular)
notes:
note: this pattern is available for free on my blog!

crème brûlée cable knit hat is knitted in round on circular needles. 
if you are looking how to knit the same hat in row please follow this link https://crazyhands.net/creme-brulee-cable-knit-hat-pattern-straight-needles/

**video tutorial:** https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ji5cgr7bjga
